normalize :: (DimensionType d, ElementType et) => Expression d et -> Expression d et Source #

Normalize an expression

normalizingTransformation :: Transformation Source #

Combine all the transformations

flattenSumProdRules :: Modification Source #

If sum or product contains sub-sum or sub-product, flatten them out

toMultiplyIfPossible :: Transformation Source #

Turn to multiplication if possible (i.e, scale a scalar R or Covector, inner product between 2 scalar R or Covector) (this is performed after all other rules completed)
